JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Requirements  1+ years of .Net development experience (ASP.Net 3.5 or greater and C# 4 or greater) Familiarity with MVC, Entity Framework, Web API/WCF Experience with a relational database (MSSQL 2005 or greater) Exceptional familiarity with object oriented development principles Exceptional familiarity with web, HTML, CSS, JavaScript Familiarity with any 3rd party controls like Telerik, Infragistics, Kendo UI etc. Strong written and verbal communication skills
